title: Understanding the Report Filter
text: The report filter in a PivotTable allows you to narrow down the data displayed based on specific criteria. This can be useful when you want to focus on a particular subset of your data.

title: Using Multiple Selection Criteria
text: When using the report filter, you can select multiple criteria to display only the data that meets all selected conditions. This helps in analyzing specific groups or subgroups within your data.

hintAnswer: the report filter allows you to display information for only a certain group or subgroup of information
title: What is the purpose of the report filter?
text: The report filter allows you to display information for only a certain group or subgroup of information.
choices: the report filter allows you to display information for only a certain group or subgroup of information
the report filter allows you to display information for groups, but not subgroups, of information
the report filter allows you to create certain types of reporting easily and quickly
